description: Xiaomi 17 Ultra has been launched in China as the successor to the company’s Xiaomi 15 Ultra. The handset joins the tech firm’s flagship lineup, which includes the standard Xiaomi 17, Xiaomi 17 Pro, and Xiaomi 17 Pro Max. The new smartphone will soon go on sale in the country via the Xiaomi China online store in distinct colourways. It features a Leica-tuned rear camera unit, headlined by a 50-megapixel primary shooter and a 200-megapixel periscope telephoto camera.
title: Xiaomi 17 Ultra Launched With Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC, Leica-Tuned 200-Megapixel Camera: Price, Features

description: Astrophysicists mapped the invisible universe by studying warped galaxies, revealing dark matter distribution and dark energy behaviour, supporting the standard cosmology model, and enabling new cosmic insights.
title: Astrophysicists Map Invisible Universe Using Warped Galaxies to Reveal Dark Matter

description: Deleting a WhatsApp account permanently removes your profile, chats, groups, and cloud backups linked to your phone number. Here we explain the difference between uninstalling and deleting, walk through step-by-step instructions for Android and iOS, and answer common questions so you know exactly what to expect before taking the step.
title: How to Delete a WhatsApp Account: Know the Steps, Things to Do Before Deactivation and Safety Tips

description: Indian Overseas Bank is a Chennai-based public sector bank that offers multiple financial services, like lockers and deposits. It allows its savings and current account customers to check their respective account balances via offline and online methods. If you wish to check the same offline, you can visit a branch nearby. However, for those who wish to get the information online, can avail Indian Overseas Bank's Internet Banking, WhatsApp Banking, Mobile Banking, and SMS and Missed Call Banking services.
title: How to Check Indian Overseas Bank Account Balance Online Using Different Methods

description: Venus appears so bright in the sky due to reflective sulfuric acid clouds, its closeness to Earth, and sunlight scattering that creates optical effects like a glory.
title: Why Venus Is the Brightest Morning Star Visible From Earth

description: Dracula is a gothic thriller series that follows Count Dracula’s journey from Transylvania to modern-day London, driven by love, loss, and immortality. With eerie visuals, sharp dialogue, and dark humour, the series offers a fresh take on the iconic vampire legend, earning praise for its performances and bold storytelling approach.
title: Dracula: A Love Tale Now Available For Streaming Online: What You Need to About its Plot, Cast, and More

description: Oppo Pad Air 5 has been launched in China as the successor to the tech firm’s Pad Air 2. The new tablet, which is currently available for pre-order, will go on sale in the country on December 31 via the company website. It is offered in Starlight Powder and Space Gray (translated from Chinese) colourways. The is equipped with a 12.1-inch LCD screen with up to 120Hz of refresh rate. It packs a 10,050mAh battery and features 33W wired fast charging support. It is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 7300-Ultra chipset.
title: Oppo Pad Air 5 Launched With 10,050mAh Battery, 12.1-Inch Display: Price, Specifications

description: Snapchat is a popular social media app that stands out due to the inclusion of social features like disappearing photos, Stories, AR Lenses, and Snap Map. For many users, it is primarily used to send snaps to friends, maintain streaks, and occasionally browse content from creators and publishers. However, there is much more to it. Snapchat also offers a suite of features designed to improve privacy, productivity, and personalisation, some of which are either buried deep inside settings or quietly introduced without much hype.
title: Top Snapchat Features You May Not Know About: Custom Privacy Controls, Object Recognition, and More

description: The Xiaomi 17 Ultra is set to be launched in China today, December 25. It is expected to arrive as the top-of-the-line model in the Xiaomi 17 series, which already comprises the Xiaomi 17, Xiaomi 17 Pro, and Xiaomi 17 Pro Max. The company has been revealing several details about the smartphone in the days leading up to its launch. The Xiaomi 17 Ultra is confirmed to debut with a Leica-tuned triple rear camera system.
title: Xiaomi 17 Ultra Launching Today: Know Price, Features, Specifications and More
